item.title: home_r00ter
item.description: Cyberchallenge.IT finals A/D (This writeup was written by me and Kien Tuong Truong, check out also his page!) Introduction Six guys, one router On the 1st of October the CyberChallenge.IT project held an Attack/Defense CTF, in which one team for each of the 28 participating Italian universities was competing to be crowned as the CyberChallenge.IT champion and to have a chance to be selected for Team Italy during ECSC 2021.
